li.a: Idling of vehicles on School Grounds

span.p: As you may know, Indiana schools will close for on-site instruction for the remainder of this school year. Please be assured that our students' education will continue. Even though our teachers and staff members are not at school, they are still working to provide students with the best remote education possible.Our students are truly at the center of everything we are trying to do.We will continue doing everything possible to provide all the support students, parents and staff need.

p.span: Sometimes it takes something of this magnitude to remind us all about the important things in life. From our families, neighbors and community members to our first responders, health care providers and public servants like our teachers, we hope and pray for everyones well-being and safety. As that old saying goes, The most important things in life arent things. So, we offer to everyone this message of hope and encouragement:
Public school teachers and staff: Thank you for all you are doing to help our students, parents and respective communities.

Students: We miss you, and we will do everything we can do to ensure that you have what you need during this time. Please reach out to your teachers, counselors and administrators we will help you get through this time.

span.p: =Parents: Thank you for your encouragement of and support for our teachers and staff during this time. We are here to assist you however possible.

p.span: Fairfield Schools will continue providing quality education to our students because of the passion, dedication and commitment of our teachers, staff, administration and School Board. We have faith in our students and we celebrate our parents for their support of our teachers and staff during these unprecedented times.

div.div:
Fairfield Community School Corporation is committed to equal opportunity and does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, color, creed, sex, handicapping conditions, or national origin including limited English proficiency, in any employment opportunity. No person is excluded from participation in, denied the benefits of, or otherwise subjected to unlawful discrimination on such basis under any educational program or student activity.
For further information, clarification, or complaint (grievance) procedures, please contact the principal's office or the following coordinator for Section 504 (handicapping conditions), Title IX (gender discrimination), A.D.A. (Americans with disabilities), Title VI (race, color, creed, national origin, and limited English proficiency).
